ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class contains all important Constants, which are used throughout the program.
    Author:
    Christian Brüesch / Jonas Gschwend

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DAMPING_FACTOR
      Constant which defines the factor of the damping in relation to the acceleration.
      static double GLIDER_WINGSPAN
      Constant which defines the wingspan of the Glider in meter.
      static double GRAVITATIONAL_FORCE
      Constant for the Gravitational Force in m per second squared.
      static double LENGTH_OF_CORD
      Constant which defines the Length of the paraglider cord in meter.
      static double TIME_INTERVALL
      Time interval in Seconds.
